event_pitch: Come on down and finally put a face to that voice! While you're here, come and join seminar or get your QSL cards checked. Not on the air yet? Then join a VE testing session, check out some radio gear, or see if lady luck is on your side at the raffle.
event_flyer_text: Please click here for the official flyer.

raffle_prizes.name: RigExpert AA-1400 Antenna Analyzer - 0.1 to 1400 MHz
MFJ MFJ-1984HP 800W, high power, 40-10 Meters End-Fed Half-wave
DIAMOND NR-770HA Chrome 144 / 440 MHz Dualband Vertical Mobile Antenna - 40 Inches tall - UHF Connector
Gift Certificate for RT Systems programing software.
